84 template<class T>
85 class ArrayRCP {
86 public:
87 
89 
90 
92  typedef Teuchos_Ordinal Ordinal;
93 
95  typedef Ordinal size_type;
97  typedef Ordinal difference_type;
99  typedef std::random_access_iterator_tag iterator_category;
101  typedef T* iterator_type;
103  typedef T value_type;
105  typedef T& reference;
107  typedef const T& const_reference;
109  typedef T* pointer;
111  typedef T* const_pointer;
113  typedef T element_type;
114 
115 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
116 
117  typedef ArrayRCP<T> iterator;
119  typedef ArrayRCP<const T> const_iterator;
120 #else
121  typedef T* iterator;
122  typedef const T* const_iterator;
123 #endif

749 private:
750 
751  // //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
752  // Private data members
753 
754  T *ptr_; // NULL if this pointer is null
755  RCPNodeHandle node_; // NULL if this pointer is null
756  size_type lowerOffset_; // 0 if this pointer is null
757  size_type upperOffset_; // -1 if this pointer is null
758 
759  inline void debug_assert_not_null() const
760  {
761 #ifdef TEUCHOS_REFCOUNTPTR_ASSERT_NONNULL
762  assert_not_null();
763 #endif
764  }
765 
766  inline void debug_assert_in_range( size_type lowerOffset_in,
767  size_type size_in ) const
768  {
769  (void)lowerOffset_in; (void)size_in;
770 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
771  assert_in_range(lowerOffset_in, size_in);
772 #endif
773  }
774 
775  inline void debug_assert_valid_ptr() const
776  {
777 #ifdef TEUCHOS_DEBUG
778  assert_valid_ptr();
779 #endif
780  }
781 
782 public:
783 
784 
785 #ifndef DOXYGEN_COMPILE
786  // These constructors should be private but I have not had good luck making
787  // this portable (i.e. using friendship etc.) in the past
788  // This is a very bad breach of encapsulation that is needed since MS VC++
789  // 5.0 will not allow me to declare template functions as friends.
790  ArrayRCP( T* p, size_type lowerOffset, size_type size,
791  const RCPNodeHandle& node );
792  T* access_private_ptr() const;
793  RCPNodeHandle& nonconst_access_private_node();
794  const RCPNodeHandle& access_private_node() const;
795 #endif
796 
797 }; // end class ArrayRCP<...>

814

826  typedef void* iterator_type;
828  typedef void value_type;
830  // typedef T& reference; // these are not valid
832  // typedef const T& const_reference; // these are not valid
834  typedef void* pointer;
836  typedef void* const_pointer;
838  typedef void element_type;

891 // 2008/09/22: rabartl: NOTE: I removed the TypeNameTraits<ArrayRCP<T> >
892 // specialization since I want to be able to print the type name of an
893 // ArrayRCP that does not have the type T fully defined!

900 template<typename T>
901 class NullIteratorTraits<ArrayRCP<T> > {
902 public:
903  static ArrayRCP<T> getNull() { return null; }
904 };
